text: The Gu-97 is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Gutamaya, produced from 3302 to the present. It costs 15,270 CR and is not insurable. It is available in Empire systems only, but can be restocked in any system.

The Gu-97 has dimensions of 6.5m x 14.9m x 2.2m, with an armor rating of 15 and shields of 15 MJ. It has a top speed of 312 m/s and a boost speed of 540 m/s. It features 1 utility mount and 2 weapon mounts.

The Gu-97 sacrifices protection for increased mobility, making it challenging for novice pilots but rewarding for experienced ones. It lacks a Frame Shift Drive, limiting its operational area to the vicinity of its deployment point. Due to its short length and light weight, it is prone to spinning out of control upon collision. It is available in 5 variants, differing only in weapons and utility slots, with F-variants having fixed weapons and G-variants having gimballed weapons.
